jd: From: Steven, Tech Talent Connect LLC steven@techtalentconnect.com Reply to: steven@techtalentconnect.com Job Title: .NET Application Developer Location: San Antonio, TX (Onsite)Duration: 12+ monthsMax Rate: 65$/C2CExp: 13+ yearsNeed dotnet profiles matching with the below criteria:1. WPF experience2. Prior Lead experience3. Strong with .net full stack experience4. at least 3 years US experienceRequired Skills:C#, .NET Framework 4.8, .NET 6 (Standard), Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Production Support.Qualifications:* Minimum 13+ years of experience in business systems analysis, application development, and testing.* Experience developing web-based applications in C#, HTML, JavaScript, ASP.NET MVC, and ASP .NET Core.* Expert full-stack development skills with n-tier applications utilizing the following technologies: C#, .Net, MVVM, Microsoft WPF, IIS, SQL Server, LINQ, and Web API.* Design, Develop, And Maintain High-Quality Software Applications Using C#, .NET Core, And Azure Services.* Strong experience leveraging design patterns including MVVM.* Strong experience in Production Support L3 role, Handling incidents, Tasks, and Problem management.* Experience in using Monitoring and log-capturing tools like Dynatrace, Zabbix, Splunk, etc.Responsibilities:* Leads and personally contributes to solution delivery through SDLC activities (analysis, development, testing, deployment, support, etc.) for one or more medium to high-complexity business capabilities and/or products.* Demonstrates thought leadership and deep understanding through analysis and improvement recommendations to multifaceted business processes, application features, and data change to resolve defects or enhance business capabilities. Tools & Technology:ServiceNow, Jira, Bitbucket, Visual Studio, qTest, Jenkins, Confluence, Bamboo.
